item.title: Kids Against Maturity: Card Game for Kids and Families, Super Fun Hilarious for Family Party Game Night
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) BEST FAMILY FUN GAME – Dear Evolved Parents, Kids Against Maturity is the perfect parental tool to approach playtime and family time. Are you sick of the same old dated games every game night? This instant classic was made and played by parents like you. With age-appropriate toilet humor and ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.99 - $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:15:18 UTC – Details)



BEST FAMILY FUN GAME – Dear Evolved Parents, Kids Against Maturity is the perfect parental tool to approach playtime and family time. Are you sick of the same old dated games every game night? This instant classic was made and played by parents like you. With age-appropriate toilet humor and funny innuendos for the adults, it can be enjoyed by all ages. Best results when played with 4 players or more.
PLAY IT ANY TIME ANY PLACE – One game set includes 600 question and answer cards and a handy box to store it all. It’s portable and a take anywhere size game. Become an instant champion while camping, sleepovers, game nights, family gatherings, summer camp, plane trips and more!
IT’S SIMPLE & ABSOLUTELY HILARIOUS – Kids Against Maturity combines the tried and tested fill-in-the- blank game-play, a perfect enjoyable hilarious way to bring your family together.
GET THE GAME ROLLING IN SECONDS – Each player gets 10 white answer cards and takes turns asking the blue question cards. Each question asker chooses the funniest answer, and the player with the highest amount of most amusing responses, wins the game.
OBLIGATORY WARNING – Humorless hover-parents and those who don’t appreciate flatulence jokes, may not approve. PLEASE REMOVE ANY CARD THAT YOU DON’T APPROVE OF. One thing is for sure; just like other tabletop board games, it’ll get your kids away from their phones, tablets, Fortnite, and other electronic devices for at least 30-90 min. Unplug together!

4.5
Price: $29.99 - $24.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:15:18 UTC – Details)

item.title: Dog Back Seat Cover Protector Waterproof Scratchproof Nonslip Hammock for Dogs Backseat Protection Against Dirt and Pet Fur Durable Pets Seat Covers for Cars & SUVs
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand Seat Covers to Fit Any Need Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10.24 x 8.27 x 4.33 inches; 2.82 Pounds Item model number ‏ : ‎ A275 Date First Available ‏ : ‎ December 23, 2017 Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $45.96 - $35.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:37:50 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Seat Covers to Fit Any Need

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 10.24 x 8.27 x 4.33 inches; 2.82 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ A275
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ December 23, 2017
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Active Pets
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07G642RMQ
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

UNIVERSAL FIT – We made these car seat covers for dogs of all shapes and sizes! From tiny smart cars to SUVs, our car seat protector is sure to fit like a glove.
EASY TO CLEAN – Dreading the shedding? No worries – even if your furry friend gets hair everywhere, our back seat cover for dogs is made with 600D Oxford waterproof cotton for easy vacuuming and cleaning.
PET PROTECTION – Safety first! 4 heavy-duty headrest anchors and 2 seat anchors keep this dog back seat cover completely in place, so your pet doesn’t slip and slide around (even on the bumpiest rides).
CUSTOMER SATISFACTION – Have any questions, comments, or concerns about your dog car seat cover? Our customer satisfaction team is purr-fectly happy to give you a helping hand (or paw)!

Non-slip Rubber Backing

Keeps your bestie safe and secure in the backseat with no slipping or sliding — even on the bumpiest rides.

4 Adjustable Buckle Straps

Adjust straps to fit around your headrests as needed and attach them to secure the cover.

Hook-and-loop Openings

Allows seat belt buckles to fit through the cover for passengers to ride with your pet.

2 Seat Anchors

Tuck into the crevices of your car seats to keep the cover securely in place.

Read more





Active Pets Extra Durable Cover
Active Pets Front Seat Cover
Active Pets Bench Style Cover
Active Pets Seat Cover w/ Mesh Window
Active Pets Standard Seat Cover
Active Pets Cargo Liner
